Package Business

Class PlayModel

java.lang.Object
Business.PlayModel
public class PlayModel
extends java.lang.Object
The type Play model will be used whenever we need to play any song along the game. It will also pause or stop any song as well as handle the volume as our users desire.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    PlayModel​(KeyMap km, PianoOctaves po, DatabaseManager dm)
    Instantiates a new Play model to be used by our PianoController.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void changeVolume​(float gain)
    Change volume is a method which will be called by the Playlist Controller which will provide us with a certain gain in order to affect the volumeChannels from the midi.
    void loop()
    The method Loop will simply be needed when asked by PlayList Controller in case our user wants to loop a song, in which case we would loop the Sequencer from here.
    void playNote​(int noteNumber, int velocity)
    Play note will be the method in charge of interpreting the specific note at a given velocity to generate the sound of the note we desire..
    void playPause()
    The method playPause will simply stop or start the sequencer from the class PlayModel when needed.
    void playSound​(int value)
    The method Play sound will get the value from the key depending on the octave we are at and play the given note by means of another method called PlayNote.
    void setSequence​(java.lang.String url, boolean file)
    Set sequence will be in charge of, given an specific url, play through the Sequencer the midi file set by SetTracker method.
    void setTrack​(java.lang.String id)
    This method SetTrack will obtain the url from the song asked by our users from the Databases.
    void startTimer()  
    void stopSound​(int value)
    The method stopSound will be executed each time we need t stop the sound of any Key from the Training section of the game or the Play section..
    void stopTimer()  

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayModel

      public PlayModel​(KeyMap km, PianoOctaves po, DatabaseManager dm)
      Instantiates a new Play model to be used by our PianoController.
      Parameters:
      km - the KeyMap containing the specific sound from each Key.
      po - the Piano Octaves to interpret the sounds to be played.
      dm - the Database Manager to store settings and changes.

  • Method Details

    • playSound

      public void playSound​(int value)
      The method Play sound will get the value from the key depending on the octave we are at and play the given note by means of another method called PlayNote.
      Parameters:
      value - the value

    • playNote

      public void playNote​(int noteNumber, int velocity)
      Play note will be the method in charge of interpreting the specific note at a given velocity to generate the sound of the note we desire..
      Parameters:
      noteNumber - the note number
      velocity - the velocity

    • setSequence

      public void setSequence​(java.lang.String url, boolean file)
      Set sequence will be in charge of, given an specific url, play through the Sequencer the midi file set by SetTracker method.
      Parameters:
      url - the url containing the song to be played.
      file - the file containing our famous song Megalovania.

    • playPause

      public void playPause()
      The method playPause will simply stop or start the sequencer from the class PlayModel when needed.

    • stopSound

      public void stopSound​(int value)
      The method stopSound will be executed each time we need t stop the sound of any Key from the Training section of the game or the Play section..
      Parameters:
      value - the value from the KeyMap we are willing to stop.

    • setTrack

      public void setTrack​(java.lang.String id)
      This method SetTrack will obtain the url from the song asked by our users from the Databases.
      Parameters:
      id - the id from the song we wish to obtain from the Database.

    • loop

      public void loop()
      The method Loop will simply be needed when asked by PlayList Controller in case our user wants to loop a song, in which case we would loop the Sequencer from here.

    • changeVolume

      public void changeVolume​(float gain)
      Change volume is a method which will be called by the Playlist Controller which will provide us with a certain gain in order to affect the volumeChannels from the midi.
      Parameters:
      gain - the gain obtained by the Slider from the Playlist Controller.

    • startTimer

      public void startTimer()

    • stopTimer

      public void stopTimer()
